name: European Union of Electrical Wholesalers
membership: EUEW is a member of EuroCommerce https//www.eurocommerce.eu
goal:
Vision: EUEW is the voice of national associations in electrical wholesaling in Europe, which are striving to achieve peoplesâ€™ welfare through electricity.

Mission: EUEW develops and represents the interests of electro-technical wholesalers and distributors in Europe.

The values of EUEW are centred on ensuring continuous development and professionalism through open dialogue, permanent support and integrity.

Goals: EUEW should be the watchdog for regulations, ensuring the sustainability of the electrical wholesalers' industry. It should be a business and industry intelligence provider and should be as the reference community in its industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU Initiatives and strategies: Circular economy, Clean Energy for all Europeans, Single Market, Digital Single Market, Clean transport, Taxation , Coordinated Plan for Artificial Intelligence, Better Regulation,

Legislative proposals : Product safety and market surveillance regulations, WEEE directive, ROHS directive, Eco-design directive, energy labelling directive, Construction Product Regulation, Energy Performance in Building Directive, Energy Efficiency Directive, REACH review, Waste Framework Directive
